resources.string: Send request failed, please check your Internet connection or connected with admin.

The request has been send. Your operation will be recorded on server, don\'t send again. If the door does not open, please make sure that your public key has been record on server or you can also connected with admin.
Please use other way to open the door when it is midnight. Your operation will be recorded on server, please do not send malicious request.

Can\'t find the public key on local. Please click Generated bellow to generated a key pair. After generated the public key, please connected with admin and record your public key on server. You can get the key on settings again. The software looks like crashed, but it needs long time to generated a key pair which depend your phone.
Generated success! Please copy the public key and recorded it on server.
The key is valid for 6 months, please re-register after expiration.
